sn40.3:1.4: idha bhikkhu pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajano sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti, yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn40.3:1.6: So khvaham, avuso, pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharami sato ca sampajano sukhanca kayena patisamvedemi. Yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn40.3:1.7: Tassa mayham, avuso, imina viharena viharato pitisahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti.
sn40.3:2.1: Atha kho mam, avuso, bhagava iddhiya upasankamitva etadavoca:
sn40.3:2.3: Ma, brahmana, tatiyam jhanam pamado, tatiye jhane cittam santhapehi, tatiye jhane cittam ekodim karohi, tatiye jhane cittam samadaha’ti.
sn40.3:2.4: So khvaham, avuso, aparena samayena pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharami sato ca sampajano sukhanca kayena patisamvedemi, yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja vihasim.
sn40.3:2.5: Yanhi tam avuso samma vadamano vadeyya …pe… mahabhinnatam patto”ti.
